info.title: Whispir Applications APIs
info.description:
The following APIs allow developers to build applications that utilise Whispir's cross channel 
messaging capability to deliver push notifications.

The APIs documented here facilitate:
- App Registration
- User/Device Registration 
- Retrieval of Messages
- Sending Push Notifications with Rich Messaging
- Retrieval and Update of Profile information

These API calls will be implemented on the existing API that is registered at api.whispir.com, however as the main user population will be client side, a new authentication scheme will be introduced to handle client side auth.

This document is intended to be modified by many participants.  To ensure that changes are versioned, every modification will be automatically recorded in gist.github.com.
